description: The Isolationist (Josef Huber) is a fictional character in the Marvel Comics Universe, created by Peter David and Pablo Raimondi. The character's first appearance was in X-Factor vol. 1, #89 on a single page, but his story wasn't continued until X-Factor vol. 3 #16, fifteen years later.
name: Isolationist
powers: Possesses the powers of all living mutants.
